| HistoryText             = As part of a ploy to convince [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] to teach him to be a better hero, [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] hired an actor to pretend to be [[Dormammu (Earth-616)|Dormammu]] and staged a fight to team-up with Spider-Man. In the middle of the battle, Deadpool jammed brains retrieved from a morgue into the [[Mindless Ones]]' heads, supposedly turning them into "Mindful Ones" which rebelled against their master.{{r|Spider-Man/Deadpool Vol 1 1}}
